name: palm-tree-tech-website
description: Palm Tree Tech LLC - Bespoke Software Development & AI Consultancy Website

scripts.minify: npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js && npm run minify:html
scripts.minify:html: html-minifier-terser --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-css --minify-js -o index.min.html index.html && html-minifier-terser --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-css --minify-js -o privacy.min.html privacy.html
scripts.build: npm run minify && npm run update-references
scripts.update-references: sed -i 's/styles\.css/styles.min.css/g' index.min.html && sed -i 's/script\.js/script.min.js/g' index.min.html && sed -i 's/styles\.css/styles.min.css/g' privacy.min.html

author: Palm Tree Tech LLC
